Name: PvZ2_Prepreprelease_PS_P4
NewFeatures: 新增禅境花园（主要贴图补充制作：索菲sophine），尚未完善，不听取建议，请等待以后的更新完善
新增海盗僵尸博士机甲，并且调整了僵尸博士的行为权重，尽量贴近原版
设置界面可以调整游戏内动画的帧率上限，可能对性能有好处，但是对视觉效果不利，如果在设置界面中调整回初始值，需要重新启动游戏才能生效
EnNewFeatures: Added Zen Garden(extra textures drawn by @索菲sophine). Unfinished, and rejecting any advice on its development by now. Look forward to future update.
Added Pirate Zomboss Mech. Adjusted Zomboss Active Weight, making it closer to vanilla.
Allowed switching max framerate of animations in game, might be good for performance, but lack of visual confort. If changed back to "UnLimited", better restart the game
